note.p: Buried: St Giles' cemetery, now Ascension Cemetery, Cambridge
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1929 vol 122 pp xv-xviii, plate, signed by R T G
References: Meg Weston Smith, 'E A Milne and the Creation of Air Defence: Some Letters From an Unprincipled Brigand, 1916-1919' in NR 1990 vol 44 pp 241-255
James R Moore, 'On the Education of Darwin's Sons: The Correspondence Between Charles Darwin and the Reverend G V Reed, 1857-1864' in NR 1977-8 vol 32 pp 51-70
